title: Riot Games wasn't at Pax Aus 2015
body:
riot games wasn't at pax this year and i was do i still get any skin codes or anything?

I got my pax tickets on the 11/5/2015

-thanks

replies.body: I think Riot said they were gonna focus more on OPL rather than pax/armageddon events this year (so no skins 5 you).
